# ID Conventions

## Layer

- **UI** - User Interface layer
- **API** - API layer
- **DB** - Database layer

## Component

- **Button** - Interactive button element
- **Input** - Text input field
- **Card** - Card display component

## Feature

- **Login** - User authentication
- **Signup** - New user registration

## Priority

- **P0** - Critical
- **P1** - High
- **P2** - Medium
- **P3** - Low

## Prefix

- **UI** - User Interface
- **API** - API
- **DB** - Database
